response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to extend this offer to you at a special price of $1,350,000. We understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and we aim to bridge the gap while ensuring both parties benefit. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1350000}
